column8: A new cart is created with a status code 201.
column12: None (The cart can be created without any prior setup, assuming the payload includes valid data.)
column19:
1. Send a POST request to /carts with a valid payload.
2. Verify the response contains the new cart details.

column8: User’s cart details are returned with status code 200.
column12: The specified user ID has an existing cart in the database.
column19:
1. Send a GET request to /carts/user/{userId} with a valid user ID
2. Verify the response contains the user’s cart details

column8: Deleted cart response is returned with status code 200.
column12: A valid cart ID exists in the database.
column19:
1. Send a DELETE request to /carts/{id} with a valid cart ID
2. Verify the cart is marked as deleted
